message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is really my starting point for serious negotiations.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I can't go above $16,000. Could we find a middle ground?
Bob, I'm seeing some progress here. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need you to meet me closer to my price. How about $16,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower your price. Based on my budget, I'm able to offer $16,250 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
